title: [Large-Scale] Science Practical Competency Enhancement Program Through Humanistic Thinking

context.prior_knowledge: Three or More Years of Practical Experience in Scientific Fields and Basic Humanities Competency
context.additional_context: A course applying interactive instructional methods to replace lecture-based education, where science professionals analyze humanities texts to develop critical thinking and problem-solving skills. Practical applicability is verified through project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Enhance the ability to apply metaphorical expressions from literary texts to scientific problem-solving frameworks
Improve collaborative critical thinking skills through peer feedback (evaluation criterion: achieve feedback quality of over 80%)
Development of a practical project proposal based on humanities case analysis (100% submission and peer evaluation within 4 weeks)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
